contest-event.event-date:
May 27, 1950 D Belle Vue May Contest (Class D)
Belle Vue May Contest (Class D) 140 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival belle-vue-may-contest-class-d
O'er Hill and Dale
Belle Vue (Pagoda Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK
Open to bands which have not won a cash prize at the Belle Vue Contests in 1947,1948, and 1949, and limited to small bands. No band to exceed 20 players nor less that 16 players.
1st prize £15 and 25 guinea Challenge Cup. 2nd prize £10. 3rd prize £5. 4th prize £3. 5th prize £2.
May 22, 2011, 12:56 p.m. April 19, 2012, 11:01 p.m.
